item.title: Tiramisu
item.description: Prepare the Sponge Cake: In a bowl, mix the egg, yogurt, oat flour, baking powder, and sweetener until smooth. Lightly grease a small microwave-safe dish or mug and pour in the batter. Microwave on high for 3 minutes, checking after 2 minutes and adding 15-second intervals if needed until cooked. Let the sponge cake cool for a few minutes, then slice it into thin layers. Soak the Layers: Dip each sponge layer in cooled coffee, letting it absorb slightly without getting too soggy.
